title: La Ballena
subtitle: The Whale
meta_desc: Learn whale vocabulary in Spanish with audio. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, ocean animals Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Ballena
pages.prompt: A majestic realistic humpback whale swimming in deep blue ocean, enormous and graceful, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La ballena es enorme.
pages.prompt: A huge realistic whale swimming with small fish nearby showing incredible scale, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La ballena salta del agua.
pages.footer: The whale jumps from the water.
pages.prompt: A spectacular realistic humpback whale breaching out of the ocean, massive splash, professional wildlife photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La ballena tiene cola.
pages.prompt: A realistic whale tail (fluke) rising above the ocean surface, water dripping, sunset background, professional wildlife photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La ballena canta.
pages.prompt: A realistic whale in deep blue ocean with visible sound waves emanating, peaceful deep water, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
